### rCharts rPlot Example

```{r comment = NA, results = 'asis', message = F}
require(rCharts)
options(RCHART_WIDTH = 600, RCHART_HEIGHT = 400)
r1 <- rPlot(mpg ~ wt | am + vs, data = mtcars, type = 'point')
r1$print('chart1', include_assets = T, cdn = T)
```
